mapper.insert: insert into t_agent (ID, REAL_NAME, CREDENTIALS_SALT, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, ID_NUMBER, LEVEL, PARENT_AGENT_ID, SHARGING_RATIO, SERVICE_CHARGES, CAN_WITHDRAW, CHARGING_BOX_NUM, FROZEN_AMOUNT, ORDER_NUM, TOTAL_REVENUE, TOTAL_SHARE, CREATE_TIME, LEAVE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialsSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shargingRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceCharges,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canWithdraw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargingBoxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_agent
REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDENTIALS_SALT = #{credentialsSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_AGENT_ID = #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARGING_RATIO = #{shargingRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_CHARGES = #{serviceCharges,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAN_WITHDRAW = #{canWithdraw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGING_BOX_NUM = #{chargingBoxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROZEN_AMOUNT = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_REVENUE = #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_SHARE = #{totalShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEAVE_TIME = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_agent set REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDENTIALS_SALT = #{credentialsSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_AGENT_ID = #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARGING_RATIO = #{shargingRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_CHARGES = #{serviceCharges,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAN_WITHDRAW = #{canWithdraw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGING_BOX_NUM = #{chargingBoxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROZEN_AMOUNT = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_REVENUE = #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_SHARE = #{totalShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LEAVE_TIME = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select.if: SELECT PASSWORD FROM t_agent WHERE #{name} = t_agent.USER_NAME
SELECT ID_NUMBER FROM t_agent WHERE #{name} = t_agent.USER_NAME
